message: This is my first offer. I propose we divide the money 700000 for me and 300000 for you.
I think a more even split is fairer. This offer reflects that.
Considering the inflation, I've adjusted my offer. I propose we divide the money 600000 for me and 400000 for you. I believe this is a fair compromise.
I'm willing to go higher than your previous offer, but I still believe a more equal split is better in the long run.
